item.description:
We will feature Dave Stokes of the MySQL Community Team (at Oracle) talking about MySQL 5.6:

 

MySQL 5.6 has many improvements and new features that you may not know about that you will want to exploit.  Find out how changes in replication, Global Transaction IDs, sub-partitions,
optimizer tracing, and other changes will make you life as a DBA better.

-------------
Logistics
-------------

Free pizza and soda will be served, so please RSVP accurately.

To RSVP anonymously, please login to the Meetup site with the e-mail address "admin at sheeri dot com" and the password "guest".

For more information, see: http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: 1st floor of the NERD Center, in the Paul room
item.name: The Boston MySQL Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
